titles: A gospel plea (interwoven with a rational and legal) for the lawfulness and continuance fo the antient setled maintenance and tenths of the ministers of the Gospel in two parts, proving that there is a just, competent, comfortable maintenance ... that the present opposition against tithes ... / by William Prynne ...
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
publisher: Printed by T. Child and L. Parry for Edward Thomas,
notes: Parts 1 & 2 have special t.p.'s and separate pagings.
Bound with "The remainder, or second part of A gospel plea."
Imperfect: pages stained with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
